scripts.start: npm run stop && npm run build && docker compose run start
scripts.restart: npm run stop && docker compose run start
scripts.compile: npm run lint && npm run truffle:compile
scripts.migrate: npm run compile && npm run truffle:migrate
scripts.test:ci: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose run test_runner
scripts.test:local: npm run stop && npm run build && docker compose run test_runner
scripts.docker:test: npm run migrate && npm run truffle:test && mocha --recursive ./tests
scripts.truffle:compile: cd blockchain/EVM/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle compile --network development_geth && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle compile --network development_matic
scripts.truffle:test: cd blockchain/EVM/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle test --network development_geth && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle test --network development_matic
scripts.truffle:migrate: cd blockchain/EVM/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle migrate --network development_geth && ../../node_modules/.bin/truffle migrate --network development_matic
